name: Dominating the Wasteland: I Control an Immortal Sect in the Apocalypse
author: Dorothy
content: Forging supreme treasures of the Immortal Realm from apocalyptic scrap, wielding the arts of immortal cultivation to conquer the apocalyptic wasteland. Soul transmigrating between two worlds where truth and illusion blur, in the Realm of the Voidâ€”a frenzy of immortal cultivation!
